name: phasher
author: Drew Foehn <drew@pixelburn.net>
description:
A password hasher, with HTML5 storage. Based on the original Chrome extention Password Hasher plus. 
Built with the Ionic framework, Angular, Lawnchair, Require.js, JQuery and lodash
